= Introduction =
 * Author: Bast
 * this is a plugin that broadcasts info about a mob kill

= Installation ==
 * see the [Installation] page

= Troubleshooting =
 * run the command "bkill debug" to enable debugging

= Help =
 {{{
/*
[FOR PLUGIN AUTHORS ONLY]

Broadcasts when a mob is killed
Example
  function OnPluginBroadcast (msg, id, name, text)
    if id == "37a61c4570508448e19c7c14" and msg == 1 then
      local pvar = GetPluginVariable(  "37a61c4570508448e19c7c14", "kill_info")

      -- get the mobs
      loadstring( pvar )()
      kill = kill_info
    end
  end

xBroadcast_Kills : Broadcast 1
kill_info = {}
  kill_info.mob = "The miller's wife"
  kill_info.vorpal = 0
  kill_info.vorpal_weapon = ""
  kill_info.time = 1275867123
  kill_info.gold = "2267"
  kill_info.bonusxp = "5"
  kill_info.level = "139"
  kill_info.xp = "5"
  kill_info.tp = 0
*/
 }}}
